description: Converts 2 oils or consumables of the same rarity into 1 oil or consumable if the same rarity
Converts 4 oils or consumables of the same rarity into 1 oil or consumable one rarity higher
Converts 3 permanent items of the same rarity into 1 permanent item of the same rarity.
Converts 5 permanent items of the same rarity into 1 item one rarity higher.
